summary: Roy edits a small town newspaper. A rancher is murdered, and his fortune is inherited by a young boy. Editor Roy, with the assistance (?) of big city reporter Dale, brings the killers to justice.
cast: Roy Rogers|Trigger|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Dale Evans|Carol Hughes|George Meeker|Lanny Rees|Ruby Dandridge|George Lloyd|Arthur Space|Frank Reicher|George M. Carleton|Flying 'L' Ranch Quartet|Bob Nolan|Sons of the Pioneers|Pat Brady|John Daheim|Hugh Farr|Karl Farr|Doye O'Dell|Lloyd Perryman|Tim Spencer|Johnny Walsh
keywords: b western|double feature film|actor shares last name with character|actor shares first and last name with character|state in title
title: Home in Oklahoma
